name: Boom Gaming
description: Boom Gaming brings you the best in live caller Bingo. We have 7 gaming channels for you to choose from including: Boom Bingo, Boom Bingo 2, Beach Bingo, Character Bingo, Dog Bingo, Kid Bingo, and Boom Bingo Keno - all with live callers bringing you the bingo action real-time! Your single account gives you access to all of our unique game offerings.
